title: Nell's Irish Boiled Cake
ingredients: ['150g (5oz) sultanas', '75g (3oz) dried currants', '175g (6oz) brown sugar', '115g (4oz) butter', '250ml (8 fl oz) water', '4 tablespoons dry sherry', '125g (4 1/4 oz) wholemeal flour', '125g (4 1/4 oz) plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
